about_the_game:
Offroad Transport Simulator is the ultimate, sandbox experience jampacked with off-road challenges, advanced raw terrain modification system, day-night cycle, and plenty of great features that will satisfy even the most hardcore drivers.



As a freelance driver in the transportation industry, you’ll have a base truck and a rescue jeep at your disposal. Complete your objectives delivering various cargo to the buyers. Earn money, gain reputation and leave your competitors in the mud.



Use your earnings to repair and modify your vehicle. Buy brand new machines that enable the transportation of different kinds of cargo such as wood, rocks, barrels, and more. Express yourself by customizing your truck, change the paint job, and personalize it with the stickers/decals to build your in-game brand!



  • Open world with random events.
  • Day/night system.
  • Dynamic mud/dirt terrain manipulation system.
  • 11 Warehouses.
  • 8 Vehicles each with a full physic base drive model.
  • Winch systems.
  • Weight systems.
  • Vehicle gearbox systems in manual and automatic.
  • Dynamic drivetrain systems.
  • Diff lock systems.
  • Vehicle Customization.
  • 3 types of jobs "Transport Jobs", "Rescue Missions" and "Cargo Jobs".
  • Independent cargo trading.
  • Support for steering wheel controllers.
  • Vehicle durability, repair systems, and repair stations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium Dual Core 2.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTS 450 Series, AMD Radeon HD 6770 or better (min 1 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo E6850 3.0 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5800+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6670
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Sit behind the wheel of powerful trucks and take care of business. Face a harsh off-road environment and maintain your vehicles and equipment to successfully transport valuable cargo long distances! Be careful to not get stuck in the mud as the time is money and your competition never sleeps!
